pr_title: Comment out a bit more VR stuff to avoid a native resolution issue in module standalone workspaces

timeline.message: Try to remove a Component that ends up invoking OpenVR

timeline.author: skaldarnar
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -78,6 +63,7 @@ public void buttonStateChanged(VRControllerState_t stateBefore, VRControllerStat
      * @param pose - the controller pose - a homogenous transformation matrix.
      * @param handIndex - the hand index - 0 for left and 1 for right.
      */
+    /* commented out due to a natives issue and VR not working at the moment anyway

replies.bodyText: Yep not sure why I didn't do that. Obvious improvement is obvious :-) Thanks!
replies.author: Cervator
